Articles.Content:
My mods:

KSP Version: 0.25 x32

Output log: https://www.sendspace.com/file/mo4968

I'd really like help please, this most commonly happens when going from runway back to SPH or launchpad to VAB.

Edited November 6, 2014 by Tortoise

Did you use -force-opengl?

I haven't entered any commandline arguments.

The error suggests file corruption:

Crash!!!

ERROR: Error while initializing dbghelp.dll, GetLastError: 'The operation completed successfully.' (Address: 00000000)

========== OUTPUTING STACK TRACE ==================

ERROR: Error while initializing dbghelp.dll, GetLastError: 'The operation completed successfully.' (Address: 00000000)

========== END OF STACKTRACE ===========

**** Crash! ****

That said, you're almost certainly running into the memory limit Ã¢â‚¬â€œ B9 alone might cause that, and it almost certainly will with KWR installed, too, unless you've deleted a ton of textures.

Try the -force-opengl option, installing ActiveTextureManagement, or both, as recommended in the OP for B9.
Ill try today, thanks. Ill post feedback
Hasn't crashed so far with ATM, thanks.
